Description: BlueOak Server Node.js Framework by BlueOak is swagger-matic, that is, it maximizes the value of the Swagger-enabled API by using it to drive runtime behavior. BlueOak Server loads the API, connects the paths it defines to developer's implementation code, exposes that API to the network; and validates that every request is well-formed, per that API.
Cocos2D-XNA is a 2D/3D game development framework, written specifically for XNA. The framework offers support to other platforms than deprecated Microsoft XNA targets such as the MonoGame runtime.
The Less Framework is a CSS grid system that aims to assist developers with designing adaptive web sites. It intends to contain 4 layouts and 3 sets of typography presets, all based on a single grid.

The Ice Cream CSS framework intends to offer developers a basic grid layout with predefined classes for simple web pages. The framework presents a 12 column layout with responsive design options for multiple screen dimensions and an image wrapper with the goal to minimize grid development from scratch.

Formee is a CSS framework that presents developers with stylized HTML and CSS for most forms on web pages. The framework's goal is to offer web developers and designers with options to customize or to use without additions.
The 52 CSS framework intends to provide a grid system for HTML5 form validation and update to standards in web development, CSS3 and HTML5.

The 1kb Grid aims to be a tool that offers a CSS grid system, loosely based on 960 Grid system (of Nathan Smith). The framework intends to reduce the need for code writing and employment of streamlining CMS page templates all while aiming to be under 1kb.

The 960 Grid System aims to offer rapid prototyping, and integration into a production environment. The CSS framework intends to offer printable sketch sheets, design layouts, and a CSS file that have identical measurements.

The Concise CSS framework is written in SASS with PostCSS plugins. It aims to be a lighter option to Bootstrap and Foundation by focusing on native HTML elements only. The intent is to render a lightweight framework with plug-in options to minimize the need to override the presented code. The framework proposes prebuilt yet customizable headers, forms, lists, print stylesheets, and grid layouts that are mobile responsive.
Xitrum aims to be an async and clustered Scala web framework and HTTP(S) server that is a fusion on top of Netty, Akka, and Hazelcast frameworks.

Unfiltered is a Scala framework that aims to provide servicing HTTP requests in Scala. It intends to offer a consistent vocabulary for handing requests on various server backends, without impeding direct access to their native interfaces.

Spray is an open-source Scala framework that aims to provide a toolkit for building REST/HTTP-based integration layers on top of Scala and Akka. The framework intends to offer an asynchronous, actor-based, fast, lightweight, modular and testable platform.
Socko an open source, lightweight and embeddable Scala framework that intends to offer web servers that can serve static files and support RESTful APIs to our business logic implemented in Akka.

Skinny is a full-stack Scala framework built on Skinny Micro. The framework's intended concept is Scala on Rails, inspired by Ruby on Rails and allowing for sustainable productivity on Servlet-based web app development.

The total.js framework aims to be a web application framework for creating web sites and web services using JavaScript, HTML and CSS. The framework does not have any dependencies and is written from the scratch.

Tesla is a MVC style framework that aims to offer a framework that is built on top of Node.js and Express. The framework intends to offer expedited option to configure web applications, with structured defaults and flexible boilerplates.
Riot is a JavaScript framework that intends to provide custom tags to modern browsers with virtual DOM and custom syntax. The goal is to allow for a smaller learning curve with a mirco framework.

Hypo aims to be a dependency Injection for JavaScript by using a xml configuration file that outlines all the "beans" and dependencies in an application. The intention is to create a configuration object that defines "entities" and dependencies in one location to be retrieved the hypo instance. Hypo intends to support many Spring features such as transient entities, lazy entities, abstract entities, parent entities, and factories.
Chibi intends to be a micro JavaScript framework that offers lighter CSS coding for web applications, to help with narrow bandwidths and diverse browsers.
The Riloadr framework intends to provide a cross-browser framework that offers an independent and responsive image loader written in Javascript.

The TinyView JavaScript framework aims to offer developers tools to use the "V" in MVC. The framework intends to offer a highly focused for SubView and Memory Leaks for MVC applications written in JavaScript.

Mag intends to be a semantic data binding framework that uses normal HTML as a template and a related module (plain JS object) as instructions for transpiling/interpolations for JavaScription applications.

The PowerVR Framework aims to be a cross-platform and cross-API framework that acts as a scaffold for developers to build a rendering or game engine. It features different modules at varying levels of abstraction.
Vert.x is a tool-kit framework that aims to provide reactive web applications on the JVM. It has a variety of language options such as Java, Groovy, Ruby and JavaScript.
Cucumber aims to provide a platform to build various types of software. The framework features updated documentation, automated testing, and specification testing.

Kryo aims to be an object graph serialization framework for Java. The goals of the project are speed, efficiency, and an easy to use API. The project intends to be useful any time objects need to be persisted, whether to a file, database, or over the network.
Connexion is a framework on top of Flask that aims to provide to handle a REST API requests based on OpenAPI 2.0 Specification (formerly known as Swagger Spec) files in YAML.

Spark Framework aims to be a simple and lightweight Java web framework built for rapid development. Spark's intention to provide a pure Java alternative for developers are seeking to develop web applications in Java.
